mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_phone) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userPhone})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, user_res from tbl_member where user_id = #{userId} and user_pw = #{userPw}
select user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, user_res from tbl_member where user_id = #{id}
